Fellow players, I represent strategic balance in this game. Unlike P2 who's positioning as a power broker of a dominant alliance, or P5 who's closely tied to P4, I offer you flexibility and measured gameplay. Keeping me maintains game equilibrium and prevents either P2's alliance or P5's partnership from gaining overwhelming control. I'm open to collaborative strategy with all remaining players. A vote to save me preserves your options and prevents power concentration in the coming rounds.
